item.description:
There are no additional tickets available for Thursday nights game.

We have a small block of Bruins Tickets with Premium Club seats in section 111 for Thursday, January 6 game vs the Minnesota Wild at the Garden. They were given to me by a Red Sox Natives member.

We will be selling any remaining tickets that become available for 50% of face value.

You must be able to pay for and pick up the tickets in advance.

We will meet at 6pm at the Garden on game night.



Thanks,

Frank
item.how_to_find_us: We will E Mail Waiting List RSVPs if tickets become available
item.name: Boston Bruins vs Minnesota Wild Game Tickets
